channel.title: Emulation on theGreatWhiteShark
channel.description: Recent content in Emulation on theGreatWhiteShark

item.title: Using ZynAddSubFx as sound synthesizer in TuxGuitar
item.description: TuxGuitar configuration It’s fairly simple. Just start ZynAddSubFX and TuxGuitar right after each other. Now in TuxGuitar head to the menu entry Tools > Settings and choose the bottom tab Sound. As MIDI Sequencer choose TuxGuitar Sequencer and as MIDI Port choose ZynAddSubFX. This will wire up both programs and you can use them seamlessly from now on. ZynAddSubFX configuration But to generate sounds using ZynAddSubFX you have to select an instrument first.
